entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
